content.prompt: Hyrum is at a concert when a flute player hits a very high note at the end of a song. Which of the following best explains why the pitch of the note sounds so high?

choices.label: It has a long wavelength and high frequency.
It has a short wavelength and high frequency.
It has a long wavelength and low frequency.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
